article:
{{taxobox
 | image = Microcystis aeruginosa.jpeg image_caption = [[Microcystis
 | aeruginosa]] name = Chroococcales regnum = Bacteria subregnum = Eubacteria
 | phylum = Cyanobacteria ordo = 'Stigonematales' ordo_authority = Geitler 1925
}}

'Stigonematales' is the order of cyanobacteria that includes filamentous strains
that produce hormogonia and exhibit true branching. Under the more recent
classification system devised by Rippka et al., these strains are listed under
section V [http://www-cyanosite.bio.purdue.edu/taxon79.html].
